reviewText: 25 sexy, funny Race Queens of all shapes and sizes (mostly five feet plus with 30ish-20ish-30ish measurements - yes, they list the height and measurements of each girl) show off their stuff in not only their uniforms but also swimsuits.  Extras include scenes from car shows and virtual points of view (like a puppy-cam that jumps into a lap of one of the girls). Some of the girls seem uncomfortable, maybe because they are sucking in their gut, as one model pointed out, but the mixture of girls means you will find alot of models you find pretty and interesting.  Even the credits at the end had interesting footage.

It was great, from beginning to end. Unlike Race Queens 2, it didn't go to indepth, and the models just wore there uniforms, you didn't see them running around and such like in Race Queens 1, but you got a ... load of more models. Waiting for Race Queens 3
